languages.text: "Вот почему на Тассере я был сам не свой. Мне было стыдно принимать твои ухаживания. Мне было стыдно, что на нас смотрят".
"That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."
languages.original_text: "Вот почему на Тассере я был сам не свой. Мне было стыдно принимать твои ухаживания. Мне было стыдно, что на нас смотрят".

traits.locale_text: "That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."
"That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."
"That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."
"That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."
"That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."
"That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."

languages.text: 「だから、タッセーラでは普段の自分らしく振る舞えなかったんだ。お前の好意に応じたことが恥ずかしかったし、誰かに俺たちの姿を見られるのも恥だった」
languages.original_text: "That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."

traits.locale_text: 「だから、タッセーラでは普段の自分らしく振る舞えなかったんだ。お前の好意に応じたことが恥ずかしかったし、誰かに俺たちの姿を見られるのも恥だった」

languages.text: "Daher habe ich mich auf Thassera auch verstellt. Ich habe mich geschämt, Euren Avancen nachzugeben, geschämt, dass Leute uns sehen könnten."
languages.original_text: "That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."

traits.locale_text: "Daher habe ich mich auf Thassera auch verstellt. Ich habe mich geschämt, Euren Avancen nachzugeben, geschämt, dass Leute uns sehen könnten."

languages.text: « C'est pour cette raison que je n'étais pas moi-même, sur Thassera. J'avais honte de céder à vos avances, honte d'être vu à vos côtés. »
languages.original_text: "That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."

traits.locale_text: « C'est pour cette raison que je n'étais pas moi-même, sur Thassera. J'avais honte de céder à vos avances, honte d'être vu à vos côtés. »

languages.text: «Por eso me comporté de un modo tan extraño en Thassera. Me avergonzaba ceder a sus insinuaciones, que la gente nos viera».
languages.original_text: "That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."

traits.locale_text: «Por eso me comporté de un modo tan extraño en Thassera. Me avergonzaba ceder a sus insinuaciones, que la gente nos viera».

languages.text: “所以我在塔瑟拉的表现才那么古怪。无论是纵容你的求爱，还是让其他人看到我们在一起，都让我感到羞愧。”
languages.original_text: "That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."

traits.locale_text: “所以我在塔瑟拉的表现才那么古怪。无论是纵容你的求爱，还是让其他人看到我们在一起，都让我感到羞愧。”

languages.text: "Sırf bu yüzden Thassera'da kendim gibi davranamıyordum. Seninle olan yakınlaşmalara boyun eğmekten utanıyordum, insanların bizi beraber görmesinden utanıyordum."
languages.original_text: "That's why I wasn't acting like myself on Thassera. I was ashamed to indulge your advances, ashamed of having people see us."

traits.locale_text: "Sırf bu yüzden Thassera'da kendim gibi davranamıyordum. Seninle olan yakınlaşmalara boyun eğmekten utanıyordum, insanların bizi beraber görmesinden utanıyordum."
